homeArticle: Where the morning begins with comfort, and the night ‚Äî with coziness
homeCompanyDescription:
LLC "OSIYO HOME TEX" specializes in the production of cotton fabric for bedding and sets, as well as ready-made bedding sets. The company operates in its own production facilities located in the Namangan region.

The production uses a wide range of modern equipment from leading manufacturers worldwide, which allows producing a large assortment of high-quality products capable of satisfying the demands of the most discerning customers.
modernEquipment: Modern equipment and qualified staff enable quick order completion
qualityDescription: We use only high-quality materials and modern equipment to produce our products
deliveryDescription: Delivery of goods in large quantities across Russia and CIS countries

companyDescription_2: The company operates in its own production facilities located in the Namangan region, which ensures full quality control at all stages of production.
companyDescription_3: We use modern equipment from leading global manufacturers, allowing us to produce products that meet international quality standards and satisfy the needs of even the most demanding customers.

cottonFabrics_description: We offer the following types of cotton fabrics:
cottonFabricsAdvantages_list:
• High hygroscopicity ‚Äî absorbs moisture well
  • Made from natural fibers ‚Äî does not cause allergies
  • Comfortable to use in hot weather. Soft and gentle to the touch
  • Easy care ‚Äî allows washing in household conditions
cottonYarnProduction: Our company independently produces yarn from 100% cotton, allowing us to control quality from the earliest stages of fabric production and ensure the eco-friendliness of our products.
address: Namangan region, Namangan city, Raustan Mahalla, Dustlik St., 7
infoblock4:
Solid Color Dyeing

As part of our production cycle, we also offer solid color dyeing using professional jig dyeing machines. Our capacity reaches up to 150,000 linear meters of fabric per month, allowing us to fulfill both standard and custom orders efficiently.

  • Even and long-lasting dye coverage
  • Wide range of colors (including Pantone matching)
  • High resistance to washing and fading
  • Environmentally friendly dyes
infoblock5:
Fabric Printing

OSIYO HOME TEX offers high-quality fabric printing using advanced rotary printing equipment. Our production line supports up to 1,000,000 linear meters of printed fabric per month, with up to 12 colors used simultaneously.

  • Sharp and fade-resistant prints
  • Rich and vibrant color palette
  • Increased durability of printed designs
  • Custom design options available


Printing is available on poplin, ranforce, satin, and calico fabrics.
sertContent:
The company OSIYO HOME TEX pays special attention to product quality and environmental safety. All production processes are organized in accordance with international standards and are certified with official ISO certificates.

üìå We comply with the following international standards:
‚úîÔ∏è ISO 9001:2015 ‚Äî Quality Management System
‚úîÔ∏è ISO 14001:2015 ‚Äî Environmental Management System
‚úîÔ∏è ISO 45001:2018 ‚Äî Occupational Health and Industrial Safety Management System

üîí These certificates confirm:
‚Ä¢ Strict control at all stages of production
‚Ä¢ Environmental safety
‚Ä¢ Healthy and safe working conditions for personnel
‚Ä¢ Reliable and consistent product quality for clients

Our certification is not just a formality, but a confirmation of our responsibility and commitment to high standards.
